channel.title: Can anyone help me with my dragons?
channel.description: OK I don't like the look of the dragons on the PI I'm using I want to make them look better :P right now they look like: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/rmmnoo.jpg[/img] If anyone knows how to make them look like the 508 dragons would you mind leaving me a link for a tut or telling me?

item.title: Can anyone help me with my dragons?
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Think I will just gotta fix the drops they don’t drop bones haha

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help me with my dragons?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

ezzi:

Ehh I don’t really like how there all miss figured? But I’m kinda having second thoughts. . .This is how they looked when rs was good .__.

Yep, just keep them.
It would be a lot of unnecessary work.
